testcase.name: reqSerialize

failure.message: Cannot construct instance of `serial.SerializationPOJO` (no Creators, like default constructor, exist): cannot deserialize from Object value (no delegate- or property-based Creator) at [Source: (String)"{"meta":null,"data":{"id":1523,"name":"Sasuke","email":"aa@alal.com","gender":"male","status":"active"}}"; line: 1, column: 2]
